import Filter from "./Filter"; import React, { useState, useContext, useEffect } from "react"; import Button from "react-bootstrap/Button"; import { Row } from "react-bootstrap"; import Form from "react-bootstrap/Form"; import Modal from "react-bootstrap/Modal"; import axios from "axios"; import AppContext from "../context/appContext"; function FilterModal() { const { item, setItem, color, setColor, size, setSize, price, setPrice, gender, setGender, } = useContext(AppContext); const [filter, setFilter]=useState([]); const [show, setShow] = useState(false); const handleClose = () => setShow(false); const handleShow = () => setShow(true); function onSearch(e) { e.preventDefault(); axios .get( `http://localhost:8080/products?item=${item}&color=${color}&gender=${gender}&price=${price}&size=${size}`) .then((response) => { setFilter(response.data); console.log() }) .catch((error) => { console.log("Error getting data: " + error); }); } return ( <> Modal heading
Item setItem(e.target.value)} autoFocus /> Color setColor(e.target.value)} autoFocus /> Catrgory setGender(e.target.value)} > Size setSize(e.target.value)} placeholder="Sizes" autoFocus /> Price setPrice(e.target.value)} placeholder="Price" autoFocus />
{filter.map((product) => (
{product.item}
{" "}

{product.sizes}

{product.gender}

{product.color}
))} ); } export default FilterModal;
